thread.title: The 21 Funniest Tweets About This Year's Super Bowl Commercials
thread.title_full: The 21 Funniest Tweets About This Year's Super Bowl Commercials

author: Cosmopolitan.com
title: The 21 Funniest Tweets About This Year's Super Bowl Commercials
text:
It's safe to say there are almost just as many people who watch the Super Bowl for the commercials as there are people who watch it for the game itself — and as per usual, Twitter definitely delivered some hilarious commentary in response to this year's most iconic ads. Here are just a few of the funniest tweets about this year's Super Bowl commercials.
Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 1.
congratulatobs to justin beiber for being cast as the new six flags old dude
— jomny sun (@jonnysun) February 6, 2017 2.
Not to get too political on here, but I'd still fuck the Brawny paper towels guy before Mr. Clean.
— OhNoSheTwitnt (@OhNoSheTwitnt) February 6, 2017 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 3.
Super Bowl commercials involving the word "daddy": 2
— Kendra W ✨ (@kendrawcandraw) February 6, 2017 4.
ME: Yay Coke! Thanks for standing up for America!
ALSO ME: (whispering) This is a fragile alliance, corporate overlords. Don't look at me.
— Carlos Maza (@gaywonk) February 6, 2017 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 5.
Damn Justin did a commercial with an Nsync song and none of the other members. Savage level 12/10 #Superbowl
— Travon Free (@Travon) February 6, 2017 6.
if that's a buick, football causes cte
— ☕netw3rk (@netw3rk) February 6, 2017 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 7.
Rooting for the commercials
— quinta b. (@quintabrunson) February 6, 2017 8.
Next up, an inspirational ad about journalism, featuring sallow-eyed actors reading Twitter in bed at 4 a.m., wide awake
— Matt Pearce (@mattdpearce) February 5, 2017 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 9.
If tha guy was faking his death, that means there was a body in the car. Where's the body @sprint ? Where's the body?
— WalterBlakeKnoblock (@WBKnoblock) February 6, 2017 10.
TOM BRADY HAS NOT EATEN A PANCAKE IN AT LEAST 5 YEARS
— Gabriella Paiella (@GMPaiella) February 6, 2017 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 11.
Movie pitch- Babewatch. It's the exact script as Baywatch but The Rock's character is played by the pig from Babe.
— Ben Schwartz (@rejectedjokes) February 6, 2017 12.
"We love America, but also we're not racist. Just - we are sorry it's like this now." - Every Super Bowl Commercial
— Mike Drucker (@MikeDrucker) February 5, 2017 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 13.
If you drive drunk tonight we're going to subject you to that Justin Bieber @TMobile Super Bowl Commercial the entire way to jail. #SB51
— Wyoming, MN Police (@wyomingpd) February 6, 2017 14.
Give Jason Statham every zinger for life
— Mindy Kaling (@mindykaling) February 6, 2017 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 15.
Commercial 1: Girls have to fight twice as hard to be taken seriously
Commercial 2: Men are heroes for doing basic household cleaning
— Caroline Siede (@CarolineSiede) February 6, 2017 16.
WELP. I know what's going to haunt my nightmares tonight. pic.twitter.com/ztKqZrg3nq
— Parker Molloy (@ParkerMolloy) February 6, 2017 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 17.
Best play executed by Tom Brady so far in this #SuperBowl tonight. pic.twitter.com/MIH8nx7hpv
— Jesse Horne (@Jesse_Horne) February 6, 2017 18.
How do I wash the shame off of me after seeing that Mr. Clean commercial?
— Noël Wells (@RealTomHankz) February 6, 2017 Advertisement - Continue Reading Below 19.
Can someone please explain to me if this Nintendo ad was meant to be pro-Trump or anti-Trump? pic.twitter.com/BkJxuOZXiE
— Pixelated Boat (@pixelatedboat) February 6, 2017 20.
Very grateful for that ad for reminding me about the existence of Oil
— Patrick Monahan (@pattymo) February 6, 2017 21.
every other movie/tv ad during the super bowl is a team of men shooting guns and punching cars while a teenage girl whisper-sings a lullaby
— demi adejuyigbe (@electrolemon) February 6, 2017 Follow Gina on Twitter .
